DynamicsCompressorNodeThreshold.summary: The threshold property of the interface is a k-rate representing the decibel value above which the compression will start taking effect.

remarks.para: The threshold property's default value is -24 and it can be set between -100 and 0.

para.see: The threshold attribute has no effect on signals lowers than its value, but induce volume reduction on signal stronger than its value.
